Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Enums
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    io.servicetalk.encoding.api.ContentCodecBuilder
    encoding-api based solution is being replaced with a netty implementation available under servicetalk-encoding-netty dependency.
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcClientSecurityConfigurator
    Use GrpcClientBuilder.sslConfig(ClientSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcServerSecurityConfigurator
    Use GrpcServerBuilder.sslConfig(ServerSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.HttpServerSecurityConfigurator
    Use HttpServerBuilder.sslConfig(ServerSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.PartitionedHttpClientSecurityConfigurator
    Use PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.appendClientBuilderFilter(PartitionHttpClientBuilderConfigurator).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.PartitionHttpClientBuilderConfigurator
    Use PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.
    io.servicetalk.http.api.SingleAddressHttpClientSecurityConfigurator
    Use SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.sslConfig(ClientSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.transport.api.ClientSecurityConfigurator
    Use ClientSslConfigBuilder.
    io.servicetalk.transport.api.SecurityConfigurator
    Use ServerSslConfigBuilder or ClientSslConfigBuilder.
    io.servicetalk.transport.api.ServerSecurityConfigurator
    Use ServerSslConfigBuilder.
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.LegacyTestCompletable
    Use TestCompletable instead.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.LegacyTestSingle
    Use TestSingle instead.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.test.Verifiers
    Use StepVerifiers instead.
    io.servicetalk.encoding.api.ContentCodings
    API replaced by io.servicetalk.encoding.netty.ContentCodings
    io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal.ClientSecurityConfig
    Use ClientSslConfig.
    io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal.ReadOnlyClientSecurityConfig
    Use ClientSslConfig.
    io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal.ReadOnlyServerSecurityConfig
    Use ServerSslConfig.
    io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal.ServerSecurityConfig
    Use ServerSslConfig.
  • Enums 
    Enum Description
    io.servicetalk.transport.api.SecurityConfigurator.SslProvider
    Use SslProvider.
    io.servicetalk.transport.api.ServerSecurityConfigurator.ClientAuth
    Use SslClientAuthMode.
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcClientBuilder.GRPC_DEADLINE_KEY
    Do not use. This is internal implementation details that users should not depend on.
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcClientMetadata.GRPC_MAX_TIMEOUT
    Do not use. This constant will be removed in future releases. If necessary, define an alternative constant in your application or use null for infinite timeout.
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcServerBuilder.GRPC_DEADLINE_KEY
    Do not use. This is internal implementation details that users should not depend on.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    io.servicetalk.buffer.api.CharSequences.isAsciiString​(CharSequence)
    Internal implementation detail that will be removed in follow-up releases. Please rely on API inside CharSequences to manipulated ascii strings.
    io.servicetalk.client.api.ConnectionFactoryFilter.append​(ConnectionFactoryFilter<ResolvedAddress, C>)
    Use appendConnectionFactoryFilter(ConnectionFactoryFilter) at the builder of a client
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Completable.idleTimeout​(long, TimeUnit)
    Use Completable.timeout(long, TimeUnit).
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Completable.publishAndSubscribeOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Completable.publishAndSubscribeOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Completable.publishOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Completable.publishOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Completable.subscribeOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Completable.subscribeOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Publisher.idleTimeout​(long, TimeUnit)
    Use Publisher.timeout(long, TimeUnit).
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Publisher.publishAndSubscribeOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Publisher.publishAndSubscribeOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Publisher.publishOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Publisher.publishOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Publisher.recoverWith​(Function<Throwable, ? extends Publisher<? extends T>>)
    Use Publisher.onErrorResume(Function).
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Publisher.subscribeOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Publisher.subscribeOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Single.idleTimeout​(long, TimeUnit)
    Use Single.timeout(long, TimeUnit).
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Single.publishAndSubscribeOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Single.publishAndSubscribeOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Single.publishOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Single.publishOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Single.recoverWith​(Function<? super Throwable, ? extends Single<? extends T>>)
    Use Single.onErrorResume(Function).
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.Single.subscribeOnOverride​(Executor)
    This method will be removed in a future release. Consider switching to Single.subscribeOn(Executor) and/or using Executor.execute(Runnable) for offloading.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.test.Verifiers.stepVerifier​(Publisher<T>)
    Use StepVerifiers.create(Publisher) instead.
    io.servicetalk.concurrent.api.test.Verifiers.stepVerifierForSource​(PublisherSource<T>)
    Use StepVerifiers.createForSource(PublisherSource) instead.
    io.servicetalk.encoding.api.ContentCodec.decode​(Buffer, int, int, BufferAllocator)
    Use the plain ContentCodec.decode(Buffer, BufferAllocator) version and Buffer.slice(int, int) where needed.
    io.servicetalk.encoding.api.ContentCodec.encode​(Buffer, int, int, BufferAllocator)
    Use the plain ContentCodec.encode(Buffer, BufferAllocator) version and Buffer.slice(int, int) where needed.
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcClientBuilder.enableWireLogging​(String)
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcClientBuilder.secure()
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcExecutionStrategies.Builder.offloadWithThreadAffinity()
    Use a single threaded executor with GrpcExecutionStrategies.Builder.executor(Executor) to ensure affinity.
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcServerBuilder.backlog​(int)
    Use GrpcServerBuilder.listenSocketOption(SocketOption, Object) with key ServiceTalkSocketOptions.SO_BACKLOG.
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcServerBuilder.enableWireLogging​(String)
    Use GrpcServerBuilder.enableWireLogging(String, LogLevel, BooleanSupplier) instead.
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcServerBuilder.secure()
    Use GrpcServerBuilder.sslConfig(ServerSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.grpc.api.GrpcServiceFilterFactory.append​(GrpcServiceFilterFactory<Filter, Service>)
    Use GrpcServiceFactory.appendServiceFilter(GrpcServiceFilterFactory)
    io.servicetalk.http.api.HttpExecutionStrategies.Builder.offloadWithThreadAffinity()
    Use a single threaded executor with HttpExecutionStrategies.Builder.executor(Executor) to ensure affinity.
    io.servicetalk.http.api.HttpServerBuilder.backlog​(int)
    Use HttpServerBuilder.listenSocketOption(SocketOption, Object) with key ServiceTalkSocketOptions.SO_BACKLOG.
    io.servicetalk.http.api.HttpServerBuilder.enableWireLogging​(String)
    Use HttpServerBuilder.enableWireLogging(String, LogLevel, BooleanSupplier) instead.
    io.servicetalk.http.api.HttpServerBuilder.secure()
    Use HttpServerBuilder.sslConfig(ServerSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.allowDropResponseTrailers​(boolean)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.allowDropResponseTrailers(boolean) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.appendClientFilter​(StreamingHttpClientFilterFactory)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.appendClientFilter(StreamingHttpClientFilterFactory) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.appendConnectionFactoryFilter​(ConnectionFactoryFilter<R, FilterableStreamingHttpConnection>)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.appendConnectionFactoryFilter(ConnectionFactoryFilter) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.appendConnectionFilter​(StreamingHttpConnectionFilterFactory)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.appendConnectionFilter(StreamingHttpConnectionFilterFactory) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.autoRetryStrategy​(AutoRetryStrategyProvider)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.autoRetryStrategy(AutoRetryStrategyProvider) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.bufferAllocator​(BufferAllocator)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.bufferAllocator(BufferAllocator) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.disableHostHeaderFallback()
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.disableHostHeaderFallback() on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.enableWireLogging​(String)
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.executionStrategy​(HttpExecutionStrategy)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.executionStrategy(HttpExecutionStrategy) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).

    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.protocols​(HttpProtocolConfig...)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.protocols(HttpProtocolConfig...) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.retryServiceDiscoveryErrors​(ServiceDiscoveryRetryStrategy<R, ServiceDiscovererEvent<R>>)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.retryServiceDiscoveryErrors(ServiceDiscoveryRetryStrategy) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.secure​(BiConsumer<HostAndPort, ClientSecurityConfigurator>)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and create a MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer that invokes SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.sslConfig(ClientSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.serviceDiscoverer​(ServiceDiscoverer<U, R, ServiceDiscovererEvent<R>>)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.serviceDiscoverer(ServiceDiscoverer) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.socketOption​(SocketOption<T>, T)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.socketOption(SocketOption, Object) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.unresolvedAddressToHost​(Function<U, CharSequence>)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.unresolvedAddressToHost(Function) on the last argument of MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(String, Object, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.MultiAddressHttpClientFilterFactory.append​(MultiAddressHttpClientFilterFactory<U>)
    Use MultiAddressHttpClientBuilder.appendClientFilter(MultiAddressHttpClientFilterFactory)
    io.servicetalk.http.api.PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.allowDropResponseTrailers​(boolean)
    PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.allowDropResponseTrailers(boolean) on the last argument of PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(PartitionAttributes, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.appendClientBuilderFilter​(PartitionHttpClientBuilderConfigurator<U, R>)
    Use PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer).

    io.servicetalk.http.api.PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.protocols​(HttpProtocolConfig...)
    PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.protocols(HttpProtocolConfig...) on the last argument of PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(PartitionAttributes, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.secure()
    Use PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and create a PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer that invokes SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.sslConfig(ClientSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.socketOption​(SocketOption<T>, T)
    PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.socketOption(SocketOption, Object) on the last argument of PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(PartitionAttributes, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).

    PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.initializer(SingleAddressInitializer) and SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.unresolvedAddressToHost(Function) on the last argument of PartitionedHttpClientBuilder.SingleAddressInitializer.initialize(PartitionAttributes, SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.enableWireLogging​(String)
    io.servicetalk.http.api.SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.secure()
    Use SingleAddressHttpClientBuilder.sslConfig(ClientSslConfig).
    io.servicetalk.http.api.StreamingHttpClientFilterFactory.append​(StreamingHttpClientFilterFactory)
    Use HttpClientBuilder.appendClientFilter(StreamingHttpClientFilterFactory)
    io.servicetalk.http.api.StreamingHttpConnectionFilterFactory.append​(StreamingHttpConnectionFilterFactory)
    Use BaseHttpBuilder.appendConnectionFilter(StreamingHttpConnectionFilterFactory)
    io.servicetalk.http.api.StreamingHttpServiceFilterFactory.append​(StreamingHttpServiceFilterFactory)
    Use HttpServerBuilder.appendServiceFilter(StreamingHttpServiceFilterFactory)
    io.servicetalk.http.netty.H1SpecExceptions.Builder.allowPrematureClosureBeforePayloadBody()
    Use H1SpecExceptions.Builder.allowPrematureClosureBeforePayloadBody(boolean).
    io.servicetalk.http.netty.H2ProtocolConfigBuilder.enableFrameLogging​(String)
    Use H2ProtocolConfigBuilder.enableFrameLogging(String, LogLevel, BooleanSupplier) instead.
    io.servicetalk.opentracing.zipkin.publisher.reporter.UdpReporter.Builder.enableWireLogging​(String)
    Use UdpReporter.Builder.enableWireLogging(String, LogLevel, BooleanSupplier) instead.
    io.servicetalk.tcp.netty.internal.ReadOnlyTcpServerConfig.backlog()
    Use ReadOnlyTcpServerConfig.listenOptions() with key ServiceTalkSocketOptions.SO_BACKLOG.
    io.servicetalk.tcp.netty.internal.TcpServerConfig.backlog​(int)
    Use TcpServerConfig.listenSocketOption(SocketOption, Object) with ServiceTalkSocketOptions.SO_BACKLOG.
    io.servicetalk.transport.api.ClientSslConfigBuilder.disableHostnameVerification()
    Disabling hostname verification may leave you vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks. See server identity on the risks of disabling. If the expected value isn't automatically inferred use ClientSslConfigBuilder.peerHost(String) to set the expected value. When disabling is intended, use ClientSslConfigBuilder.hostnameVerificationAlgorithm with "" as argument.
    io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal.BuilderUtils.useEpoll​(EventLoopGroup)
    Use NativeTransportUtils.useEpoll(EventLoopGroup)
    io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal.BuilderUtils.useKQueue​(EventLoopGroup)
    Use NativeTransportUtils.useKQueue(EventLoopGroup)
